content: i wish the pc companies would get together with nintendo and try to figure out a way to bring more pc only games to nintendo. i will never be able to play cod with friends because there's no way to on a switch. there's been quite a few pc only games i've seen that interest me. the so called "similar" ones that switch offers up don't always have the best gameplay or mechanics. if they can offer us fortnite with all that goes into that game i don't understand why they couldn't have a switch version of cod that played the same. your thoughts in things like this?

The Switch is a good system, but it's now running on 5 year old tablet based architecture and has it's limitations.  You can't realistically every game that comes out over the next couple of years that have been optimized for PC's and PS5/XBox Series X consoles to run on that kind of system.

It's not a wrong thought, but Nintendo switch is built for its own purpose and it's style and mode of operation is not going to be compatible with the kind of games that could be on PC.   Let's see if there could something like that in the future.         runswithspatulas        1
